articles.title: Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from Polish Ambassador
articles.content:
Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from Polish Ambassador
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, received credentials from Krzysztof Ciebien, Polish ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Tuesday.
					 After receiving credentials, he had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Swedish King Wishes Korean People Bigger Success
articles.content:
Swedish King Wishes Korean People Bigger Success
						
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Kang Yong Dok, DPRK ambassador to Sweden, presented credentials to Carl Gustaf Xâ…¥, king of Sweden, on October 2.
					 The king highly praised the Korean people for having made great successes in their efforts for building an economic power and improving the people's standard of living under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He expressed belief that the Korean people would achieve bigger successes in the future.

articles.title: Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Visit Party Founding Museum
articles.content:
Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Visit Party Founding Museum
						
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Chief Jo Il Min and members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) visited the Party Founding Museum Tuesday on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They looked round historic relics and materials on display, being briefed on the fact that President Kim Il Sung provided the organizational and ideological foundation for founding the party in the flames of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, realized the cause of founding the party right after the liberation of the country based on it and developed the party into the staff of the revolution.
					
					 At the end of the visit, the chief said that the President gave a new origin to the building of a working-class party with the brilliant rays of Juche.
					
					 The feats the President performed by strengthening the Workers' Party of Korea into a revolutionary party strong in independence and a mother party enjoying absolute support and trust of the people will shine forever, he noted.
					
					 The WPK founded and led by the President and leader Kim Jong Il will win victory only in the future, too, as it is holding Marshal Kim Jong Un in high esteem.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as WPK General Secretary
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as WPK General Secretary
						
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the April 25 House of Culture Tuesday to mark the 17th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present there were senior party, state and army officials including Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and Hwang Pyong So, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials and labor innovators of institutions and industrial establishments in Pyongyang, overseas compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, made a report.
					
					 The reporter said that Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the WPK in line with the unanimous will and desire of the entire party, the whole army and all the people was an epochal political event in the development of the WPK and the Korean revolution.
					
					 Kim Jong Il made a new history of building  the WPK into the party of the leader with his brilliant wisdom and rare insight, extraordinary organizing ability and revolutionary sweep and performed great feats in accomplishing the socialist cause of Juche  while shouldering upon himself the heavy burden of party building and activities for decades, the reporter said, adding;
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as Kimilsungism and set forth a programme for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities and thus clearly indicated the guiding idea and action programme the revolutionary party should hold fast to forever in our era.
					
					 He set forth an original policy for modeling the whole party on Kimilsungism and energetically led the struggle to implement it, bringing about a fundamental turn in the party's organizational and ideological construction and leadership art unprecedented in the history of our party.
					
					 He built our party into a mother party which serves the people with its roots struck among them by fully embodying the President's idea of believing in the people as in Heaven.
					
					 He made sure that party work and activities were clearly oriented to imbuing the whole party with the Songun idea and enforcing the Songun politics as required by the new era of the Juche revolution.
					
					 In the 1990s when the Korean revolution faced a stern trial, he laid down the Songun politics as the party's revolutionary leadership mode and comprehensively embodied it, putting the DPRK on the status of a political, ideological and military power and ushering in a new era of building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Under his leadership, the party's policy for the country's reunification and strategy of external activities were successfully carried out and the June 15 era of reunification in which the nation advanced in the idea of By Our Nation Itself was ushered in and the country's international position and influence rapidly increased.
					
					 The WPK has invariably preserved its revolutionary character and nature as Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's party and is glorifying the new century of the Juche revolution with the annals of victory and prosperity under the uplifted banner of great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The reporter called for fully demonstrating the dignity and might of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea and building the strongest country and people's paradise under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Women Hold Oratorical Meeting
articles.content:
Women Hold Oratorical Meeting
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Officials and members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea held an oratorical meeting "Ever-victorious Workers' Party of Korea" at the Hall of Women on Tuesday to mark the 17th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 69th founding anniversary of the WPK.
					 Present there were Kim Jong Sun, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the women's union, and its officials and members in Pyongyang.
					
					 Song Yang Ran, chairwoman of the Pothonggang District Committee of the women's union, made a speech titled "Secret of Victory". She said that the WPK had recorded annals of victory and glory, fully demonstrating the might of invincibility under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 She added that the WPK was making a dynamic advance towards the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche with Marshal Kim Jong Un at its head.
					
					 Jang Myong Hwa, chairwoman of the primary organization of the women's union in Sosan-dong, Mangyongdae District, said in an oratory "Life and Soul" that the mightiness of the DPRK dignified with independence, self-supporting and self-reliance in defence and the eye-opening reality of the country making a leaping forward with dynamism are ascribable to the leadership of the WPK.
					
					 Ri Ok Bun, member of the women's union living in Janggyong-dong No. 2 in Sosong District, said in an oratory titled "Look of Mother" that the fluttering flag of the WPK was the look of the great mother who takes full responsibility for the destiny and future of the people all over the country.
					
					 She stressed all the Koreans would live a happy life under the care of Kim Jong Un who keeps it as his motto to love the people as Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il did and rallies all service personnel and people around the WPK.

articles.title: Staff Members of Russian Embassy Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Staff Members of Russian Embassy Help Korean Farmers
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Minister-Councilor Igor Sagitov and staff members of Russian embassy here did a friendship work at the DPRK-Russia Friendship Kochang Vegetable Cooperative Farm in Chollima District on Tuesday.
					 The guests helped farmers in threshing rice.
					
					 During a break they had a talk with farmers and enjoyed an art performance.
					
					 Staff members of the embassy handed over aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: DPRK Doctorate Awarded to Korean in U.S.
articles.content:
DPRK Doctorate Awarded to Korean in U.S.
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- DPRK doctorate in socio-political science was awarded to Jong Ki Ryol, a Korean in the U.S.
					 He has made positive contributions to making information service on the personality of the peerless great persons of Mt. Paektu overseas for a long time.
					
					 An awarding ceremony took place at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.

articles.title: New Seed-Covering Material Developed
articles.content:
New Seed-Covering Material Developed 
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- New seed-covering material was recently developed by the Pyongyang Biological Technology Development Center.
					 The center has standardized the production of seed-covering material, made with mixtures of insecticide, stimulants to germination, nutrients, etc., while completing the process of seed-covering on an industrial basis.
					
					 The new seed-coating material helps seedlings to be safe from underground insects and damages caused by drought and coldness, raising the rate of germination with no adverse effect on environment.
					
					 It has been introduced to co-op farms in Pyongyang and South Hwanghae Province, proving highly effective.

articles.title: Mural Paintings of Koguryo Dynasty Preserving Original Colors
articles.content:
Mural Paintings of Koguryo Dynasty Preserving Original Colors 
						
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The world people are admiring the mural paintings in tombs of Koguryo Dynasty (B.C. 277-A.D. 668) as they have preserved their original colors.
					 The paintings, a reflection of wisdom and artistic talents of Koguryo people, vividly show the customs of the age. They are considered to be the oldest among pictorial heritages of the Korean nation, holding the noteworthy position in the history of the Oriental paintings.
					
					 In this regard, KCNA met Mun Jong Ung, a creator of the Mansudae Art Studio.
					
					 Mun said:
					
					 The murals were painted with natural aqueous colors, with which the fine artistes of the Koguryo Dynasty gave a vivid and realistic depiction of all matters and phenomena. The coloration of the dynasty had been improved throughout the Middle Ages, and thus developed into the character of traditional coloration.
					
					 The mural paintings, which are diverse in content, astonishing in idea, rich in pictorial hints and high in painting skills, laid a firm foundation for the development of Korean paintings in the Middle Ages. And they had also exerted favorable influence on the pictorial development in neighboring countries of Koguryo, including Japan.
					
					 They were listed by UNESCO as one of the world's cultural heritages.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Derides U.S. Hypocritical Talk about Denuclearization
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Derides U.S. Hypocritical Talk about Denuclearization
						
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is mulling investing one trillion U.S. dollars in the modernization of nuclear weapons in 30 years to come.
					 Its yearly expenditure for the development of nuclear weapons and atomic research stands at 10 billion U.S. dollars.
					
					 This has brought to light once again the hypocrisy of the rhetoric about a "world without nuclear weapons" made by the present chief executive of the U.S.
					
					 During his presidential election campaign in 2008 Obama committed to building "a world without nuclear weapons" and during his trip to Berlin in 2013 he called for cutting down the number of the strategic nuclear weapons in the world by one third.
					
					 But the U.S. has stepped up the development and modernization of nuclear weapons under the signboard of denuclearization.
					
					 This year it earmarked the biggest amount of fund since the 1950s for the study, development, test and manufacture of nuclear weapons and is contemplating modernizing nuclear warheads by spending 355 billion U.S. dollars in 10 years to come. If several weaponry systems are replaced after the year 2020 it is expected that the amount of fund will further swell.
					
					 New weapon-grade plutonium production base and nuclear test ground appeared in Los Alamos, etc. in New Mexico State and uranium enrichment started in a new installation in Tennessee.
					
					 The U.S. which has a stockpile of nuclear weapons huge enough to devastate the whole earth is directing efforts to the modernization of the weapons, a serious encroachment upon the human right to existence and the world peace and stability.
					
					 No matter how noisily the U.S. may trumpet about a "world without nuclear weapons" it can never evade the responsibility as the arch criminal which poses a nuclear threat to the world by developing, manufacturing and deploying nuclear weapons.
					
					 The U.S. is the world's biggest nuclear criminal state as it manufactured nuclear weapons and used them for the first time in the world and is now keen to dominate the world with them.
					
					 The U.S. nuclear policy sparked off the race for developing and manufacturing nuclear weapons in the world. This notwithstanding, the present U.S. administration invests huge funds in the modernization of nuclear weapons, the reinforcement of equipment and the development of new delivery means. This is an extremely hideous crime that may trigger off fresh arms race and nuclear arms buildup.
					
					 It is a height of artifice to mislead the public opinion for the U.S. to talk about "a world without nuclear weapons".
					
					 What is most important for denuclearizing the world is to denuclearize the U.S.
					
					 Only when all the nuclear weapons of the U.S. are dismantled and when it drops its attempt at aggression of other countries, can the world be in peace.
					
					 It is self-evident that the international movement will be intensified to cope with the U.S. threat and blackmail with nuclear weapons.
					
					 Nothing is more foolish than to think about the denuclearization of the world before the U.S. is denuclearized.
					
					 It is nothing but a ridiculous political charade for the U.S. to cry out for denuclearization and nuclear non-proliferation.
					
					 The denuclearization of the world can never come true as long as the U.S. pursues the modernization of nuclear weapons.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Unbreakable Unity and Cohesion of WPK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Unbreakable Unity and Cohesion of WPK 
						
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Our advance and cause are sure to triumph as long as there is the leadership of the great party which has achieved unbreakable unity, the source of inexhaustible strength to win victories in the struggle and bring about changes, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an editorial article.
					 The nearly seven decade-long history of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) is a glorious one in which it has achieved unity, won victories and made advances thanks to the idea of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and their august names, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Korean revolutionaries gave origin to the genuine unity centering around the leader for the first time in history in the dark period of nation's distress.
					
					 New-type vanguard ranks united under the banner of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU), holding the peerless great man as the sun of the nation, guided by the truth that the cause of popular masses for independence was to be started and advanced by the leader. They became the core of the WPK.
					
					 The organizational and ideological foundation for founding the party was consolidated by the passionate fighters of Juche type who waged a struggle against sycophancy, dogmatism and factional strife, guided by the idea and line of their leader only.
					
					 It was the greatest feats performed by the Korean revolutionaries that they set an example of revolutionary unity unprecedented in the history for the building of a working-class party while exploring an untrodden path despite the sternest trials.
					
					 The great unity which was achieved in the early period of the revolution grew stronger in the two anti-imperialist revolutionary wars, two phases of social revolutions and socialist construction.
					
					 The history of the WPK unprecedented in its protracted, complicated and grave nature is, indeed, a proud history in which its unity and cohesion have grown steel-strong with the leader as the unitary center and it achieved the single-minded unity of the revolutionary ranks and the triumphant advance of the socialist cause by dint of the might.
					
					 The appearance of the dignified party which achieved the unbreakable unity and cohesion convinces the army and people of the DPRK of the future of the prospering country and the final victory of the revolution.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Proposal for Founding DFRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Proposal for Founding DFRK 
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo advanced by President Kim Il Sung is a patriotic and reasonable reunification proposal, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The federal formula calls for leaving the two differing social systems as they are in a unified federal state. Therefore, it is the most peaceful reunification formula as it leaves no reason to clash in the course of achieving the reunification and it is free from the danger of a war.
					
					 If the federal formula is put into force, it is possible to promote the mutual understanding between the north and the south, facilitate the national reconciliation and unity and terminate the division of the country caused by outside forces.
					
					 If the federal formula is applied and national unity achieved, tension on the Korean Peninsula will be defused and it will greatly contribute to global peace and security.
					
					 The north and the south in the historic June 15 joint declaration recognized commonness of the north-proposed low-level federation and the south-proposed confederation and agreed to work for reunification in this direction. This was the great success made by the north and the south in confirming the way of reunification common to the nation.
					
					 No force can quell the Korean nation's will to carve out its rosy future by realizing the proposal for achieving reunification by federal formula.
					
					 There is no need to copy other country's mode of reunification or propose any other mode.
					
					 The article calls upon all Koreans in the north, the south and abroad to turn out as one to achieve reunification by federal formula, irrespective of ideology and ism, political view and religious belief.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lays Bare True Picture of Capitalism
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lays Bare True Picture of Capitalism
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- In a nutshell, the capitalist society is a society full of filthy waste, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 With no rhetoric can the imperialists hide the true picture of capitalism infected with fatal and chronic diseases, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 "Material prosperity" in the capitalist society is by no means meant for the common people.
					
					 It is the U.S. where a tiny handful of the rich wallow in luxury, holding most of material wealth, whereas an overwhelming majority of toiling people lead a subhuman life. The same is true of other capitalist countries.
					
					 The poor choose suicide, driven into depravity and despair, left without any means of living. Many of them allow themselves to run the whole gamut of crimes such as addiction to narcotics and alcohol, murder and robbery.
					
					 The steady increase in crimes is bound to lead to the swell of prisoners. There are 2.2 million prisoners in the U.S., topping the world list of prisoners.
					
					 The capitalist countries are flooded with all kinds of means satisfying the greed of capitalists for a luxurious and dissipated life and paralyzing bodies and mentality of human beings, the number of  drug and alcohol addicts and dissipated elements seeking abnormal ambition is on the rapid increase and people are becoming mentally  and physically  crippled. This is the real picture of the capitalist countries which boast "affluent material and cultural life." The political rights of the overwhelming majority of the toiling masses are ruthlessly trampled down by money and power in the capitalist society called "liberal and democratic society which guarantees genuine human rights".
					
					 The end of capitalism is drawing near as it is getting evermore corrupt and ill due to its intrinsic unpopular nature and prevailing scandals.

articles.title: Chongryon Officials Call for Opening New Phase of Independent Reunification
articles.content:
Chongryon Officials Call for Opening New Phase of Independent Reunification
						
 Tokyo, October 6 (KNS-KCNA) -- Officials of organizations of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and chairpersons of its headquarters separately made public statements on Oct. 4, the 7th anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					 Ri Jong Man, managing director of the Standing Council of the Korean Federation of Workers in Commerce in Japan, said the October 4 declaration provided by leader Kim Jong Il is a programme for reunification common to the nation as it indicated the concrete and realistic way of achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country in the idea of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 Kim Yong Ju, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, underscored the need to join the youth and students in the north, the south and overseas in devoting their spirit and enthusiasm to the struggle for ushering in the second June 15 era. 
					
					 Ro Mu Hyon, vice-chairman of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, recalled the historic significance of the October 4 declaration which was provided by Kim Jong Il to all Koreans, renewing the pledge to fulfill its mission and responsibility in implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration to bring earlier the reunification of the country.
					
					 Ryang Ok Chul, vice-chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, said Koreans in the north, the south and abroad and Korean women in Japan received with joy and hope the October 4 declaration as it indicated the most correct way of developing the north-south relations and achieving peace and prosperity in the idea of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 Hwang Myong, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, Pu Yong Uk, chairperson of the Osaka Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, Kim Chun Gwon, chairman of the Hyogo Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, Jang Thae Ho, chairman of the Fukushima Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, Kim Tok Yon, chairman of the Gifu Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, and Pak Chol, chairman of the Yamaguchi Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, said all Koreans in Japan would turn out in the nationwide struggle to implement the north-south declarations, holding Marshal Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the sun of the nation and lodestar of reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Spain
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Spain 
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- A Spanish publishing house brought out in pamphlet Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" to mark the 17th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 69th founding anniversary of the WPK. 
					 The work, published on July 26, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his whole life characterized by his noble love for the country and its people.
					
					 It clarifies important issues arising in applying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Life Lauded by British Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Life Lauded by British Organization 
						
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The revolutionary life and exploits of Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, will be conveyed down through generations. 
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy said this in a special article posted on its website on Sept. 30 to mark the 17th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 69th founding anniversary of the WPK. 
					
					 A photo of Kim Jong Il was posted on the website. 
					
					 The article said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the WPK was the manifestation of all the party members and other people's ardent reverence, absolute support and trust in him as he had made a great contribution to the building of the Juche-oriented party since he started his work at the Central Committee of the WPK in 1964. 
					
					 Having him as its general secretary the WPK raised its leadership position and role and achieved great successes in bolstering up defence capability and stepping up economic construction, frustrating all the moves of the imperialists.
					
					 The Fourth Conference of the WPK decided to hold him in high esteem as general secretary for all ages and glorify his revolutionary life and undying exploits forever. 
					
					 The cause of building the Juche-oriented party will surely be accomplished under the wise leadership of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, faithful successor to the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Indonesian Party Leader Lauds WPK
articles.content:
Indonesian Party Leader Lauds WPK
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Ristiyanto, general secretary of National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, released a statement on Oct. 2 on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The statement said:
					
					 The WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung, guided by leader Kim Jong Il and growing stronger under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un is a mighty political organization which has steered the struggle of the Korean people to victory for nearly seven decades.
					
					 No party in the world can match the WPK in organizing ability, might of unity and fighting capability.
					
					 Under the leadership of the WPK the DPRK turned into a socialist state centered on the popular masses where they became the masters of everything and everything serves them.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, has wisely led the party to work world-startling miracles in the drive for building a thriving nation despite the ceaseless moves of the U.S. and other hostile forces to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 Only victory and glory will always be in store for the WPK which has invariably advanced along the road of independence, Songun and socialism under his leadership.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of WPK to Be Observed in Thailand
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of WPK to Be Observed in Thailand
						
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The Thai preparatory committee for commemorating the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) was inaugurated at Rajabat Pranakorn University on Sept. 30.
					 Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events to mark the anniversary.

articles.title: Serbian Party Leader Supports Proposal for Founding DFRK
articles.content:
Serbian Party Leader Supports Proposal for Founding DFRK
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Batric Mijovic, general secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia, released a statement on Oct. 2 in support of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK).
					 Recalling that President Kim Il Sung advanced the proposal for founding the DFRK at the Sixth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on October 10, 1980, he referred to its detailed contents.
					
					 He added:
					
					 The north and the south, in the June 15 joint declaration, recognized that there is commonness in the north-proposed low-level federation and the south-proposed confederation for national reunification and agreed to work for reunification in this direction. This was unanimously supported and welcomed not only by all Korean people but also by the international community.
					
					 The most reasonable and practical way for putting  the inter-Korean relations on a normal track, defusing the danger of a war and ushering in a new era of independent reunification and co-prosperity is to thoroughly preserve and implement the joint declarations the north and the south agreed upon in the past.
					
					 The New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia extends invariable support and solidarity to the stand of the Workers' Party of Korea and the government of the DPRK for mending the inter-Korean relations and achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and calls on all the peace-loving people in the world to support the Korean people's just cause.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador polaco
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador polaco 
						
Pyongyang, 7 de octubre (ACNC) -- Krzysztof Ciebien presento el dia 7 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante el presidente del Presidium de la  Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica de Polonia en Corea. 
					Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el diplomatico.

articles.title: Premier coreano recorre granjas de provincia de Hwanghae del Sur
articles.content:
Premier coreano recorre granjas de provincia de Hwanghae del Sur
						
Pyongyang, 7 de octubre (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, averiguo en el terreno las faenas agricolas de la granja cooperativa de Oguk del distrito de Anak y la de Chujong del distrito de Paechon, de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur.
					Tras averiguar en detalles las faenas agricolas de los dos distritos, el premier estimulo mucho a los funcionarios y trabajadores agricolas levantados para concluir con exito la agricultura de este ano.
					
					En la reunion consultiva convocada en el terreno fueron debatidos los temas para fijar correctamente el tiempo apropiado de la cosecha y terminar con celeridad la cosecha y la trilladura.
					
					El premier exhorto a hacer una innovacion en la produccion agricola al aplicar varios metodos avanzados y los exitos cientificos y tecnicos para aumentar el rendimiento ahorrando las semillas, la mano de obra y los materiales agricolas.
					
					Luego, averiguo el estado de produccion de la mina de caliza de Sunchon y la mina de Songsan.

articles.title: Acto central por 17o aniversario de eleccion de Kim Jong Il como Secretario General de PTC
articles.content:
Acto central por 17o aniversario de eleccion de Kim Jong Il como Secretario General de PTC
						
Pyongyang, 7 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 7 en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el 17o aniversario de la eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					Asistieron a la ocasion Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Hwang Pyong So y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, funcionarios de los organismos, fabricas y empresas en la capital, innovadores laborales, compatriotas en ultramar y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					El informe de ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Ki Nam, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					El informante senalo que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il fue electo como Secretario General del PTC segun la unanime voluntad y deseo de todo el partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo, lo cual fue un evento historico de gran importancia en el desarrollo del PTC y la revolucion coreana, y continuo:
					
					El Dirigente abrio una nueva historia de construir el PTC como partido del lider con su genial prevision y perspicacia, extraordinaria habilidad organizativa y la materializacion  revolucionaria encargandose durante decenas de anos de todos los trabajos para la construccion y las actividades del partido y logro grandes hazanas en el cumplimiento de la causa socialista del Juche.
					
					Con sus actividades ideo-teoricas el Dirigente formulo la idea revolucionaria del Presidente como el kimilsungismo e ilumino claramente la idea directriz y el programa de lucha a ser  tomados eternamente por el partido revolucionario de nuestra epoca presentando el programa de transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo.
					
					Al presentar la autoctona orientacion de transformar todo el partido segun el kimilsungismo y dirigir la lucha por realizarla, trajo el cambio trascendental nunca visto en la historia de nuestro partido en la construccion organizativa, ideologica y del arte de direccion del partido.
					
					Materializo con brillantez la idea de Iminwichon (considerar al pueblo como el cielo) presentada por el Presidente y construyo el PTC como partido madre que echa profundas raices entre las masas populares y sirve por el pueblo.
					
					Hizo unificar todo el partido segun la idea de Songun conforme a la demanda de la nueva epoca de la revolucion jucheana y dirigio la labor y las actividades del partido a realizar la politica de Songun.
					
					En la decada de 1990 en que la revolucion coreana sufria arduas dificultades, presento la politica de Songun como modo de la direccion revolucionaria del partido, la materializo generalmente, elevo dignamente la RPDC en la posicion de la potencia politica, ideologica y militar y abrio una nueva epoca de la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista.
					
					Bajo la direccion del Dirigente se realizaron con brillantez la politica del partido por la reunificacion de la patria y la estrategia de las actividades exteriores, se abrio la epoca del 15 de Junio por la reunificacion que avanza con el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" y se elevaron extraordinariamente la posicion y la influencia internacionales del pais.
					
					Hoy dia, el PTC mantiene siempre el caracter revolucionario y la naturaleza del partido de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il con la bandera de kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo y glorifica la nueva centuria de la revolucion jucheana como anos de la victoria y la prosperidad.
					
					Bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un todos deben construir una potencia mas fuerte en el mundo y un paraiso del pueblo exaltando la dignidad y el poderio del gran partido y la Corea de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador polaco
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador polaco 
						
Pyongyang, 7 de octubre (ACNC) -- Krzysztof Ciebien presento el dia 7 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante el presidente del Presidium de la  Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica de Polonia en Corea. 
					Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el diplomatico.

Otorgado el doctorado a compatriota en EE.UU.
